result.execSummary:
The defendant Rowdy J. PETERSEK was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Comply with sex offender treatment, if ordered by DOC.

No contact with M.O.S., her residence or any place she temporarily occupies.

No contact with minors unless approved by agent.

Provide DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rowdy J. PETERSEK

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Settlement Conference Summary.

Plea date on April 11, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Settlement conference on March 15, 2016 at 10:15 am.

Settlement Conference Summary.

Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
Cover letter.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 01/19/2016, at 2:30 p.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 12-09-15 at 9:30 a.m.    
Minutes.

$500.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail. The matter is continued for initial appearance on 11-30-2015 at 2:30 p.m., Br. 2.  Bail is set at $500.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and have no contact with M.O.S. dob 08-20-2002 or anyone under the age of 18.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the County Jail. 
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail issued.  Copy filed.
Warrant with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.

Defendant failed to appear for initial appearance.   Arrest warrant authorized.   
Minutes.

RE:  M.O.S., DOB: 08-20-2002, on 10-09-15.
Initial appearance is set for 11-16-15 at 2:30 p.m.
